ingredients.ingredient: ½ cantaloupe - peeled, seeded, and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
2 cucumbers - peeled, seeded, and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
½ small red onion, finely diced
⅓ cup poppy seed dressing, or more to taste
1 teaspoon poppy seeds, or to taste (Optional)

cookingTips: Prepare salad just before serving to maintain the crisp texture of fresh vegetables
Cube vegetables uniformly for even dressing distribution and presentation
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook through preparing a light, refreshing summer salad with fresh produce and subtle flavor balance.
